00013 /**
00014  * Abstract class: this is the superclass for all Apple Push Notification Service
00015  * classes.
00016  * 
00017  * This class is responsible for the connection to the Apple Push Notification Service
00018  * and Feedback.
00019  * 
00020  * @ingroup ApplePushNotificationService
00021  * @see http://tinyurl.com/ApplePushNotificationService
00022  */ 
00023 abstract class ApnsPHP_Abstract
00024 {
00025     const ENVIRONMENT_PRODUCTION = 0; /**< @type integer Production environment. */
00026     const ENVIRONMENT_SANDBOX = 1; /**< @type integer Sandbox environment. */
00027 
00028     const DEVICE_BINARY_SIZE = 32; /**< @type integer Device token length. */
00029     
00030     const CONNECT_RETRY_INTERVAL = 1000000; /**< @type integer Default connect retry interval in micro seconds. */
00031     const SOCKET_SELECT_TIMEOUT = 500000; /**< @type integer Default socket select timeout in micro seconds. */
00032     
00033     protected $_aServiceURLs = array(); /**< @type array Container for service URLs environments. */
00034     
00035     protected $_nEnvironment; /**< @type integer Active environment. */
00036 
00037     protected $_nConnectTimeout; /**< @type integer Connect timeout in seconds. */
00038     protected $_nConnectRetryTimes = 3; /**< @type integer Connect retry times. */
00039 
00040     protected $_sProviderCertificateFile; /**< @type string Provider certificate file with key (Bundled PEM). */
00041     protected $_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile; /**< @type string Root certification authority file. */
00042 
00043     protected $_nConnectRetryInterval; /**< @type integer Connect retry interval in micro seconds. */
00044     protected $_nSocketSelectTimeout; /**< @type integer Socket select timeout in micro seconds. */
00045 
00046     protected $_logger; /**< @type ApnsPHP_Log_Interface Logger. */

00048     protected $_hSocket; /**< @type resource SSL Socket. */
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * Constructor.
00052      *
00053      * @param  $nEnvironment @type integer Environment.
00054      * @param  $sProviderCertificateFile @type string Provider certificate file
00055      *         with key (Bundled PEM).
00056      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if the environment is not
00057      *         sandbox or production or the provider certificate file is not readable.
00058      */
00059     public function __construct($nEnvironment, $sProviderCertificateFile)
00060     {
00061         if ($nEnvironment != self::ENVIRONMENT_PRODUCTION && $nEnvironment != self::ENVIRONMENT_SANDBOX) {
00062             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00063                 "Invalid environment '{$nEnvironment}'"
00064             );
00065         }
00066         $this->_nEnvironment = $nEnvironment;
00067 
00068         if (!is_readable($sProviderCertificateFile)) {
00069             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00070                 "Unable to read certificate file '{$sProviderCertificateFile}'"
00071             );
00072         }
00073         $this->_sProviderCertificateFile = $sProviderCertificateFile;
00074         
00075         $this->_nConnectTimeout = ini_get("default_socket_timeout");
00076         $this->_nConnectRetryInterval = self::CONNECT_RETRY_INTERVAL;
00077         $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout = self::SOCKET_SELECT_TIMEOUT;
00078     }
00079 
00080     /**
00081      * Set the Logger instance to use for logging purpose.
00082      * 
00083      * The default logger is ApnsPHP_Log_Embedded, an instance
00084      * of ApnsPHP_Log_Interface that simply print to standard
00085      * output log messages.
00086      * 
00087      * To set a custom logger you have to implement ApnsPHP_Log_Interface
00088      * and use setLogger, otherwise standard logger will be used.
00089      * 
00090      * @see ApnsPHP_Log_Interface
00091      * @see ApnsPHP_Log_Embedded
00092      *
00093      * @param  $logger @type ApnsPHP_Log_Interface Logger instance.
00094      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if Logger is not an instance
00095      *         of ApnsPHP_Log_Interface.
00096      */
00097     public function setLogger(ApnsPHP_Log_Interface $logger)
00098     {
00099         if (!is_object($logger)) {
00100             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00101                 "The logger should be an instance of 'ApnsPHP_Log_Interface'"
00102             );
00103         }
00104         if (!($logger instanceof ApnsPHP_Log_Interface)) {
00105             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00106                 "Unable to use an instance of '" . get_class($logger) . "' as logger: " . 
00107                 "a logger must implements ApnsPHP_Log_Interface."
00108             );
00109         }
00110         $this->_logger = $logger;
00111     }
00112     
00113     /**
00114      * Get the Logger instance.
00115      *
00116      * @return @type ApnsPHP_Log_Interface Current Logger instance.
00117      */
00118     public function getLogger()
00119     {
00120         return $this->_logger;
00121     }

00123     /**
00124      * Set the Root Certification Authority file.
00125      * 
00126      * Setting the Root Certification Authority file automatically set peer verification
00127      * on connect.
00128      * 
00129      * @see http://tinyurl.com/GeneralProviderRequirements
00130      * @see http://www.entrust.net/
00131      * @see https://www.entrust.net/downloads/root_index.cfm
00132      *
00133      * @param  $sRootCertificationAuthorityFile @type string Root Certification
00134      *         Authority file.
00135      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if Root Certification Authority
00136      *         file is not readable.
00137      */
00138     public function setRootCertificationAuthority($sRootCertificationAuthorityFile)
00139     {
00140         if (!is_readable($sRootCertificationAuthorityFile)) {
00141             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00142                 "Unable to read Certificate Authority file '{$sRootCertificationAuthorityFile}'"
00143             );
00144         }
00145         $this->_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile = $sRootCertificationAuthorityFile;
00146     }
00147     
00148     /**
00149      * Get the Root Certification Authority file path.
00150      *
00151      * @return @type string Current Root Certification Authority file path.
00152      */
00153     public function getCertificateAuthority()
00154     {
00155         return $this->_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile;
00156     }
00157 
00158     /**
00159      * Set the connection timeout.
00160      * 
00161      * The default connection timeout is the PHP internal value "default_socket_timeout".
00162      * @see http://php.net/manual/en/filesystem.configuration.php
00163      *
00164      * @param  $nTimeout @type integer Connection timeout in seconds.
00165      */
00166     public function setConnectTimeout($nTimeout)
00167     {
00168         $this->_nConnectTimeout = (int)$nTimeout;
00169     }
00170 
00171     /**
00172      * Get the connection timeout.
00173      *
00174      * @return @type integer Connection timeout in seconds.
00175      */
00176     public function getConnectTimeout()

00179     }
00180 
00181     /**
00182      * Set the connect retry times value.
00183      * 
00184      * If the client is unable to connect to the server retries at least for this
00185      * value. The default connect retry times is 3.
00186      *
00187      * @param  $nRetryTimes @type integer Connect retry times.
00188      */
00189     public function setConnectRetryTimes($nRetryTimes)
00190     {
00191         $this->_nConnectRetryTimes = (int)$nRetryTimes;
00192     }
00193     
00194     /**
00195      * Get the connect retry time value.
00196      *
00197      * @return @type integer Connect retry times.
00198      */
00199     public function getConnectRetryTimes()
00200     {
00201         return $this->_nConnectRetryTimes;
00202     }
00203 
00204     /**
00205      * Set the connect retry interval.
00206      * 
00207      * If the client is unable to connect to the server retries at least for ConnectRetryTimes
00208      * and waits for this value between each attempts.
00209      * 
00210      * @see setConnectRetryTimes
00211      *
00212      * @param  $nRetryInterval @type integer Connect retry interval in micro seconds.
00213      */
00214     public function setConnectRetryInterval($nRetryInterval)
00215     {
00216         $this->_nConnectRetryInterval = (int)$nRetryInterval;
00217     }
00218     
00219     /**
00220      * Get the connect retry interval.
00221      *
00222      * @return @type integer Connect retry interval in micro seconds.
00223      */
00224     public function getConnectRetryInterval()
00225     {
00226         return $this->_nConnectRetryInterval;
00227     }
00228 
00229     /**
00230      * Set the TCP socket select timeout.
00231      * 
00232      * After writing to socket waits for at least this value for read stream to
00233      * change status.
00234      * 
00235      * In Apple Push Notification protocol there isn't a real-time
00236      * feedback about the correctness of notifications pushed to the server; so after
00237      * each write to server waits at least SocketSelectTimeout. If, during this
00238      * time, the read stream change its status and socket received an end-of-file
00239      * from the server the notification pushed to server was broken, the server
00240      * has closed the connection and the client needs to reconnect.
00241      * 
00242      * @see http://php.net/stream_select
00243      *
00244      * @param  $nSelectTimeout @type integer Socket select timeout in micro seconds.
00245      */
00246     public function setSocketSelectTimeout($nSelectTimeout)
00247     {
00248         $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout = (int)$nSelectTimeout;
00249     }
00250 
00251     /**
00252      * Get the TCP socket select timeout.
00253      *
00254      * @return @type integer Socket select timeout in micro seconds.
00255      */
00256     public function getSocketSelectTimeout()
00257     {
00258         return $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout;
00259     }
00260 
00261     /**
00262      * Connects to Apple Push Notification service server.
00263      * 
00264      * Retries ConnectRetryTimes if unable to connect and waits setConnectRetryInterval
00265      * between each attempts.
00266      *
00267      * @see setConnectRetryTimes
00268      * @see setConnectRetryInterval
00269      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if is unable to connect after
00270      *         ConnectRetryTimes.
00271      */
00272     public function connect()
00273     {
00274         $bConnected = false;
00275         $nRetry = 0;
00276         while (!$bConnected) {
00277             try {
00278                 $bConnected = $this->_connect();
00279             } catch (ApnsPHP_Exception $e) {
00280                 if ($nRetry >= $this->_nConnectRetryTimes) {
00281                     throw $e;
00282                 } else {
00283                     $this->_log('ERROR: ' . $e->getMessage());
00284                     $this->_log(
00285                         "INFO: Retry to connect (" . ($nRetry+1) . 
00286                         "/{$this->_nConnectRetryTimes})..."
00287                     );
00288                     usleep($this->_nConnectRetryInterval);
00289                 }
00290             }
00291             $nRetry++;
00292         }
00293     }
00294 
00295     /**
00296      * Disconnects from Apple Push Notifications service server.
00297      *
00298      * @return @type boolean True if successful disconnected.
00299      */
00300     public function disconnect()
00301     {
00302         if (is_resource($this->_hSocket)) {
00303             $this->_log('INFO: Disconnected.');
00304             return fclose($this->_hSocket);
00305         }
00306         return false;
00307     }
00308 
00309     /**
00310      * Connects to Apple Push Notification service server.
00311      *
00312      * @throws ApnsPHP_Exception if is unable to connect.
00313      * @return @type boolean True if successful connected.
00314      */
00315     protected function _connect()
00316     {
00317         $sURL = $this->_aServiceURLs[$this->_nEnvironment];
00318         unset($aURLs);
00319         
00320         $this->_log("INFO: Trying {$sURL}...");
00321 
00322         /**
00323          * @see http://php.net/manual/en/context.ssl.php
00324          */
00325         $streamContext = stream_context_create(array('ssl' => array(
00326             'verify_peer' => isset($this->_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile),
00327             'cafile' => $this->_sRootCertificationAuthorityFile,
00328             'local_cert' => $this->_sProviderCertificateFile
00329         )));
00330 
00331         $this->_hSocket = @stream_socket_client($sURL, $nError, $sError, 
00332             $this->_nConnectTimeout, STREAM_CLIENT_CONNECT, $streamContext);
00333 
00334         if (!$this->_hSocket) {
00335             throw new ApnsPHP_Exception(
00336                 "Unable to connect to '{$sURL}': {$sError} ({$nError})"
00337             );
00338         }
00339 
00340         stream_set_blocking($this->_hSocket, 0);
00341         stream_set_write_buffer($this->_hSocket, 0);
00342         
00343         $this->_log("INFO: Connected to {$sURL}.");
00344 
00345         return true;
00346     }
00347     
00348     /**
00349      * Logs a message through the Logger.
00350      *
00351      * @param  $sMessage @type string The message.
00352      */
00353     protected function _log($sMessage)
00354     {
00355         if (!isset($this->_logger)) {
00356             $this->_logger = new ApnsPHP_Log_Embedded();
00357         }
00358         $this->_logger->log($sMessage);
00359     }
00360 }
